trans-unit.source: Represents a method to be called when a <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> is signaled or times out.
trans-unit.target: Representa um método para ser chamado quando um <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>está assinalado ou exceder o tempo limite.</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: WaitOrTimerCallback represents a callback method that you want to execute when a registered wait handle times out or is signaled.
trans-unit.target: WaitOrTimerCallback representa um método de chamada de retorno que pretende executar quando um identificador de espera registado exceder o tempo limite ou está marcado.

trans-unit.source: Create the delegate by passing your callback method to the WaitOrTimerCallback constructor.
trans-unit.target: Crie o delegado transferindo o método de chamada de retorno para o construtor de WaitOrTimerCallback.

trans-unit.source: Your method must have the signature shown here.
trans-unit.target: O método tem de ter a assinatura mostrada aqui.

trans-unit.source: Create the registered wait handle by passing the WaitOrTimerCallback delegate and a <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> to <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Criar o identificador de espera registado transferindo o delegado de WaitOrTimerCallback e um <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>para <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: Your callback method executes each time the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> times out or is signaled.
trans-unit.target: O método de chamada de retorno executa sempre que o <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>exceder o tempo limite ou está assinalado.</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic] > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic users can omit the WaitOrTimerCallback constructor, and simply use the `AddressOf` operator when passing the callback method to <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A>.
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic] > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic utilizadores podem omitir o construtor de WaitOrTimerCallback e simplesmente utilizar o `AddressOf` operador ao transmitir o método de chamada de retorno para <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A>.</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic automatically calls the correct delegate constructor.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic automaticamente chama o construtor de delegado correto.

trans-unit.source: If you want to pass information to your callback method, create an object that contains the necessary information and pass it to <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A> when you create the registered wait handle.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender passar informações para o método de chamada de retorno, crie um objeto que contém as informações necessárias e transmita-a <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A>Quando cria o identificador de espera registado.</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each time your callback method executes, the `state` parameter contains this object.
trans-unit.target: Sempre que executa o seu método de chamada de retorno, o `state` parâmetro contém este objeto.

trans-unit.source: For more information about using callback methods to synchronize thread pool threads, see [The Managed Thread Pool](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como utilizar métodos de chamada de retorno para sincronizar os threads de conjunto de threads, consulte [o agrupamento de Thread gerido](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
